body:
Comment 1: 
patch to *test* this.

$ hg diff ftoa_test.go 
diff -r d745d21ef536 src/pkg/strconv/ftoa_test.go
--- a/src/pkg/strconv/ftoa_test.go	Fri May 28 22:32:29 2010 -0700
+++ b/src/pkg/strconv/ftoa_test.go	Mon May 31 18:43:15 2010 +0200
@@ -97,6 +97,7 @@
 	ftoaTest{-math.Inf(0), 'g', -1, "-Inf"},
 
 	ftoaTest{-1, 'b', -1, "-4503599627370496p-52"},
+	ftoaTest{0.09, 'f', 1, "0.1"},
 }
 
 func TestFtoa(t *testing.T) {
